prompt: Twitter is a social site that allows you to post text up to 140 characters, and it has a feature that lets you post by texting from a cell phone. Which of the following is an advantage of being able to post by cell phone?
feedback: The advantage of being able to post to Twitter from a cell phone is that, if Internet service is interrupted, you can still post. It might be possible to post quicker after a disaster to let people know that you’re okay. In areas where there are rebellions, it’s possible to post what’s happening if the government shuts down Internet service. And, you can post when you’re away from home and have no Internet access.
